channel.title: Crossbow double bolt action.
channel.description: Whenever I'm going to preform a quickbow by quickly zooming out (not by switching weapon, that seems to work fine) It will shoot a zoomed bolt and an explosive bolt right behind it. Having only pressed fire once. it does subtract the 2 bolts from your clip.
